Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 3:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
